Entries.George: Found some good quality stone. ^Maybe you can build with it or something.  ^   -Jorge %item object 390 35 %%[#]A Gift From Jorge
Entries.EvelynCooking: Dear @,^I usually don't give out my recipes... but since you've been such a sweetheart to Jorge and I, I've written this one down for you. ^   -Evelyn%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Evelyn's Recipe
Entries.summer_25_1: To Farmer @:^My knee's acting up again, and you know what helps? ^Rubbing the darn thing with hot pepper.^ Trouble is, my supply's run dry. If you've got one to spare I'd be much obliged.^   -Jorge %item quest 105 %%[#]Jorge Needs A Pepper
